product.name: Jenolan Caves, Visit Scenic World, Blue Mountains Day Tour FJ32
product.shortDescription:
Jenolan Caves Scenic World Blue Mountains Day Tours
Jenolan Caves with a visit to Scenic World in Blue Mountains
product.description:
FJ Tours are pleased to announce that we now include a visit to Scenic World on our Jenolan Caves Tour. (Rides at own expense)

Extend your visit to the Blue Mountains by having a look under them...actually go on a guided tour through the fabulous limestone caverns full of amazing stalagmites. Romantically and dramatically lit by hidden lights these caverns will amaze you with their beauty.

A day tour that takes you directly to the spectacular scenery of the heritage listed Blue Mountains.


Tour Highlights:

  • Tour through the magnificent Blue Mountains with it’s beautiful bush landscapes. 

  • Opportunity to go on the Scenic Railway, Scenic Cableway and Skyway at Scenic World - FJ Tours take you there (as market leaders we are the first to offer this on our Jenolan Caves Tour, Rides at own expense).

  • Travel to the amazing Jenolan Caves – Australia’s largest and most popular underground limestone cave system where you will enjoy a guided cave inspection. 

  • View the spectacular Grand Arch at Jenolan Caves and the unusual Blue Lake. 

  • When hunger strikes Trails licensed Bistro provides delicious light meals, snacks and drinks. (lunch at own expense). 

  • Have cameras ready for a platypus sighting. 

  • Relax as you head to Homebush Bay Wharf to board your river cruise. Enjoy the scenery of the Parramatta River finishing your tour in the heart of Sydney at Circular Quay.

BACKPACKERS/STUDENTS and SENIORS please use the student or senior price at time of booking.

PLEASE NOTE: Prams and Strollers are not permitted on the Scenic Railway and sections of the scenic walkway are not wheelchair accessible.

PLEASE CONTACT OUR OFFICE ON 029637 4466 THE DAY BEFORE THE TOUR.

product.name: Blue Mountains Adventure & Hike
product.shortDescription: Barefoot Downunder's Blue Mountains Day Tour is an exciting day out in the beautiful Blue Mountains. Our small-group guided tour is an active day including hiking, sightseeing and cultural experiences all led by experienced and fun guides.
product.description:
Barefoot Downunder’s Blue Mountains Adventure & Hike is not your average bus tour!  We take you on an adventure in the Blue Mountains hiking, sightseeing and animal watching – while learning about the Australian Indigenous culture through dreamtime stories and hearing the insightful history of the Blue Mountains.

We are one of the more active day trips in the Blue Mountains as we like to get out there and hike down to the bottom of waterfalls and back, visit unique aboriginal rock sights, see kangaroo’s in the wild and other must-visit sights including the Three Sisters and more.

Our tours are led by fun, local and experienced adventure guides who love to share the insightful history of the Blue Mountains (and Sydney) as well as having a laugh and telling a few jokes along the way. Our groups are smaller so we can show you places off-the-beaten-track where not many tour groups visit making it a more personalised day out.

If you are looking for a fun and active tour, love the outdoors and hiking then this adventure trip is for you!

product.name: Figure 8 Pools Coastal Adventure & Hike
product.shortDescription: If you are looking for an adventure that includes hiking, sightseeing, beaches, spotting wildlife, swimming, beautiful scenery with amazing views and heaps of fun then you will need to book our Figure 8 Pools Coastal Adventure Tour!
product.description:
Barefoot Downunder takes you out to visit the Figure 8 Rock Pools in the Worlds 2nd oldest National Park – the Royal National Park.  If you are looking for an adventure that includes hiking, sightseeing, beaches, wildlife, swimming, beautiful scenery and amazing views that is heaps of fun then you need to book our Figure 8 Pools Coastal Adventure tour! 

Our Figure 8 Pools trip takes you out to explore this spectacular area found just 45 minutes South of Sydney and 37 Km (23 miles) and only 45 minutes in the Worlds 2nd oldest National Park. It is a must-do for all young travellers, backpackers and students looking for a day of fun and adventure just out of Sydney.

Head out on a 6km (3.7 mi) return hike in the Worlds 2nd oldest National Park along changing terrain with spectacular scenery that includes some steep sections and requires a medium to high level of fitness.

Walk through Burning Palms Beach and see the heritage listed Coastal Shacks before continuing along the coast and across the rocks to reach the Figure 8 Pools, learn about ocean and beach safety from your adventure guide. Spend some time to relax and enjoy the area, grab your #figure8pools instagram photos and have a swim before the hike back up. 

Visit Garie beach, a beautiful little beach in the Royal National Park that is surrounded by coastal headlands. Here you can enjoy a picnic lunch then it’s off to the next adventure where you can explore, swimand relax at one of the local lagoons and beaches.

Enjoy spectacular views of the south coast at Bald HIll Lookout and Stanwell Tops, see the Hang gliders and Para gliders take off the hill!

Jump back in the bus to chill as we pump some good tunes and make our way out of the Royal National Park back to Sydney for our 1 drop off at Central YHA Hostel.

Everyone gets to enjoy a FREE drink at the end of the day at one of the local backpacker bars back in Sydney!

Check out our new Figure 8 Pools tour video here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kS3xrCk2JTs

*Depending on tide times the activities can be reversed in the day in order to reach the Figure Eight Pools at low tide.

product.name: Great Opera Hits - A Reserve
product.shortDescription: Stroll down to the Sydney Opera House and join the stars of Opera Australia for a concert of the greatest hits of opera.
product.description:
These relaxed concerts take place on summer afternoons as the sun sets across Sydney Harbour, and last around 90 minutes. 

Listen to famous arias from Bizet, Puccini, Rossini and Verdi performed by some of Opera Australia’s finest opera singers.

Location: Joan Sutherland Theatre, Sydney Opera House


Great Opera Hits

December 2016: 26, 27 at 17:00

January 2017: 1, 15, 22 at 17:00

February 2017: 12, 22, 26 at 17:00



March 2017: 5, 12, 19, 26 at 17:00

product.name: Secret Sydney Walking Tour
product.shortDescription: The Secret Sydney Walking Tour guided walking tour explores one of Sydney's best-kept secrets — the beautiful paths and gardens adjacent to Rozelle Bay and Blackwattle Bay (part of Sydney's inner-city Bays Precinct).
product.description:
The Secret Sydney Walking Tour Waterfront guided walking tour explores one of Sydney's best-kept secrets — the beautiful paths and gardens adjacent to Rozelle Bay and Blackwattle Bay (part of Sydney's inner-city Bays Precinct).

Starting at the Jubilee Park light rail station, for much of the walk we'll follow the Glebe foreshore walking path. One of the few places in Sydney with unobstructed public access to the foreshore, this path offers unique views of the Sydney CBD, Anzac Bridge and Glebe Island.

Stopping regularly to discuss points of interest, this tour gives an insight in to the history of Glebe and it's relationship with the city of Sydney. We'll also highlight the unique architectural and industrial history of the area while we take in the natural beauty of the bays precinct.

The tour route is also rich in flora and fauna – the perfect place to enjoy Sydney at its very best.

product.name: Tandem Skydive 14,000ft Shuttle Service
product.shortDescription: [With Shuttle Service - Free Transfers] for travellers in Sydney city. Skydive up to 14,000ft no more to pay. Drop into our exclusive skydive departure lounge located at 196 Elizabeth St, Sydney. 350m from Central Railway station.
product.description:
[With Shuttle Service - Free Transfers Sydney City] This product is for travellers who are in Sydney City and require return transfers from the downtown Sydney City.

Skydive for travellers Staying in Sydney. Includes easy convenient return transfers from our Sydney City skydive checkin and departure lounge located at 196 Elizabeth St, Sydney. The closest skydive to Sydney only 55min from the city. Amazing views.

We offer the best service, value skydive and fun if you are looking to do a skydive in Sydney. Up to 14,000ft no more to pay. Sydney's only self contained full service skydiving centre, the closest to Sydney only 55min from the Sydney CBD.

Being self-contained we are the only Skydive operation where you can actually watch your friends and family every step of the way through their entire Skydive. They will gear up right in front of you, board the aircraft right in front of you and land right in front of you.

We are open 7 days all year  *bookings required. Book online today and get instant confirmation, all you need to do is turn up on the day.


Maximum Value


  • Freefall from up to 14,000ft
  • Fast Jet engine aircraft with magnificent coastal and blue mountain views and Sydney city skyline
  • Video and Photos of your Skydive available
  • FREE souvenir 4 Gig USB Flash drive loaded with your skydive video and or photos with every video package purchased
  • Book on-line instantly with Visa or Mastercard
  • Unbeatable Specials for Groups, Students, Travelers and Backpackers
  • Sydney's only fully self contained skydive centre, drive in and skydive in comfort
  • Sydney: Air conditioned customer lounge, Coffee Shop, BBQ picnic areas for a great day out

product.name: Sydney Harbour and Coastal 20 Min Shared Scenic Helicopter Flight
product.shortDescription: See the view that makes Sydney so famous, from the middle of the harbour looking at the City, The Opera House and the stunning Harbour Bridge, before returning back to Sydney Airport with the memories of a lifetime.
product.description: See Sydney and its coastal wonders, in this spectacular scenic flight in a luxury Helicopter.  Depart our private lounge at Sydney's Mascot airport, and head straight to the coast and the amazing homes that abound the dramatic cliffs along Maroubra and Coogee. Tracking north you're soon over the world renowned Bondi Beach, and its crystal clear waters before passing South head into Sydney harbour. See the view that makes Sydney so famous, from the middle of the harbour looking at the City, The Opera House and the stunning Harbour Bridge, before returning back to Sydney airport with the memories of a lifetime. A Sydney first ! Individual Tickets Available.

product.name: Oz Whale Watching Saturday & Sunday BBQ Lunch Cruise
product.shortDescription: Whale watching off the Sydney Heads is an exhilarating adventure, seeing these incredible creatures frolicking and swimming in the ocean is an awe-inspiring treat that you will remember forever! BBQ buffet lunch included.
product.description:
Join us during Whale Watching season as we marvel at these incredible creatures frolicking and swimming in the tranquil waters of the Pacific Ocean. Whale watching off Sydney Heads is an exhilarating adventure, an awe inspiring treat that you will remember forever! The southern hemisphere humpback migration is estimated to be approx.. 16,000 whales this year, with an average increase of 11% per year, quite amazing considering these magnificent creatures were nearly hunted to the point of extinction 40 years ago. 
TOUR INCLUSIONS
• 4 hour whale watching cruise from King St Wharf, along Sydney Harbour, out through Sydney Heads and return.
• Informative commentary on whales, their migration patterns and behaviour including a number of interesting facts and statistics. 
• Buffet BBQ lunch on-board. Vegetarian and specific dietary requirements can be catered for with sufficient notice. Hot soup available during June, July, August, September.
• Tea, Coffee and Water.
• Vessel the “Jerry Bailey” capable of carrying 180 pax with the number limited to 95 pax on whale watching tours to ensure everyone has a good vantage point. Fully qualified crew on board.
• Comfortable vessel with multiple outside viewing areas, indoor lounge area and licensed bar for beverages (extra charge).

The boat departs from King Street Wharf, Lime st, Sydney. The wharf is located approx 100 metres north of Madame Tussauds wax museum and Sydney Sea Life Aquarium. The wharf is outside the bar called Cargo Bar.

product.name: Australia Day Dinner Cruise and Fireworks
product.shortDescription: Celebrate the nations birthday on Sydney Harbour with friends and family.
product.description:
Australia Day Fireworks Dinner Cruise 26th January 2017


Why not spend Australia Day on sensational Sydney Harbour. Enjoy a fantastic traditional 3 course Australian BBQ with good old Aussie pavlova and fresh cream for dessert. Plenty of food for everyone. See the Australia Day fireworks as well as cruise around beautiful Sydney Harbour. Gather your family and friends and join us in celebrating this great country!!

Included in your package;

3 Course Traditional Aussie BBQ
Fully Licensed Bar onboard for purchase (No BYO - beverage package available for pre-purchase)
3.0 hr cruise 

Adults $70.00pp 
Child $35.00 (5-14yrs)

Embarkation: 6:30pm Casino Wharf Pyrmont
Disembarkation: 9:45pm Casino Wharf Pyrmont


No reserved seating

product.name: Full Day Cruising
product.shortDescription: A full day cruising (Sailing, swimming, relaxing, sightseeing) on Sydney Harbour for up to 14 guests.
product.description:
Cruising

Whether it's corporate teams or your friends and family, spending a day on the helm of a classic ocean racing yacht as you cruise past the opera house and under the bridge is an un-forgettable experience.  Available all year round on any day of the week for up to 14 guests.
  • Meet at CYCA, Rushcutters bay at 10:00 am for safety briefing and depart about 10:30.
  • Learn the basics of sailing if you wish - or just let our crew handle the boat.
  • Get some memorable photos of yourself at the helm of an ocean racing classic yacht as we sail past the opera house and under the bridge.
  • Stop at one of sydney's harbour beaches for lunch and a swim.
  • Follow one of your standard itineraries around the harbour or just discuss with our skipper and plan your own route.
  • Have a snack and glass of champagne at twilight then disembark back at the CYCA around 7pm.

product.name: Jet Blast
product.shortDescription:
35 Minutes of Awesome Fun!
Departing from the iconic Darling Harbour, experience the thrill of Harbour Jet as it races past some of Sydney's most famous landmarks!
Departing daily during school holidays at 11am, 1pm and 2pm.
product.description:
BOOK ONLINE AND SAVE $15

RETAIL PRICE:  Adult $80 //  Child $50 // Family $195

ONLINE PRICE: Adult $65 //  Child $40 // Family $180 **


For SAME DAY Bookings, please call our office on 1300 887 373. Bookings are subject to availability.

** Prices not valid with any other offer, online bookings only**

By purchasing tickets, you are agreeing to our Terms and Conditions which can be found here

PLEASE NOTE: If using a deal voucher (such as groupon, living social, cudo etc) or similar, please select your code will not work on this page - Go to http://www.harbourjet.com/dealvoucher/

PLEASE NOTE, THE LAYOUT ON A SMART PHONE, MAY BE DIFFICULT TO NAVIGATE DUE TO THE SCREEN CONFIGURATION. WE RECOMMEND USING A LAPTOP, PC OR TABLET TO PURCHASE YOUR TICKETS.

Children (5-15) - Minimum height requirement is 120cm.

Family - 2 Adults + 2 Children

Sit back and hang on tight as we open the throttle and release 500 litres of water per second from the jet as we unleash the full power at 75km/h. With a mix of 180-degree spins, wild fishtails and incredible power brake stops this experience can be wet and wild but loads of fun! The Harbour Jet boat races under the famous Harbour Bridge, past Sydney’s popular icons including the Sydney Opera House, Luna Park, Fort Denison and more!

product.name: Sydney Harbour Adventure
product.shortDescription:
A 50 minute adventure, experiencing all the thrills and spills of the Jet Blast, but with so much more!
Departing daily throughout the school holidays at 12pm
product.description:
BOOK ONLINE AND SAVE $15

RETAIL PRICE:  Adult $95 //  Child $65 // Family $275

ONLINE PRICE: Adult $80 //  Child $50 // Family $260 **


For SAME DAY Bookings, please call our office on 1300 887 373. Bookings are subject to availability.

** Prices not valid with any other offer, online bookings only**

By purchasing tickets, you are agreeing to our Terms and Conditions which can be found here 

Children (5-15) - Minimum height requirement is 120cm

Family - 2 Adults + 2 Children

For those who like things a little more extreme, join us for 50 minutes of adrenalin, action and a real taste of Sydney harbour! With a mix of 270-degree spins, wild fishtails and incredible power brake stops this experience can be wet and wild but loads of fun! The Harbour Jet boat races under the famous Harbour Bridge, past Sydney’s popular icons including the Sydney Opera House, Luna Park and towards Sydney Heads!

By purchasing tickets, you are agreeing to our Terms and Conditions which can be found here

product.name: Night Photography Workshop
product.shortDescription: 3 hour workshop held on Sydney's Harbour Foreshore. Spend an exciting evening learning from a working pro photographer as you capture Sydney’s beautiful lights and iconic landmarks.
product.description:
This Photography Workshop is held on various Thursday or Friday nights from 6pm to 9pm (7pm to 10pm during daylight saving)


RUN DURING DAYLIGHT SAVING TIME :  7pm to 10pm 

& FOR THE REMAINDER OF THE YEAR :  6pm to 9pm


As the city lights come on, and the city comes alive, you will learn creative techniques to help you create postcard quality images in this fun, inspirational and eye-opening experience.

Your night begins with a harbour-side brief and introduction from a working pro photographer. As night falls, a whole new world of subjects come to life as you spend the evening exploring the bright lights of the amazing Sydney Harbour and its surrounds.

From the moving ferry lights on the harbour, to the neon lights of the central business district, to the moody and character filled streets of The Rocks, the night photography workshop will introduce you to some very simple yet very creative tips and techniques involved in shooting after dark in Sydney.

Control your camera manually as you learn how to expose for mood, capture light blur trails, zooming and light painting techniques, creative portraits at night and much more. 

Change the way you see things with a night photography workshop as you learn how to find suitable subject matter by thinking outside the square.  

For beginners looking for a fun and exciting introduction to photography or enthusiasts looking to switch to manual or looking to brush up on their technique. The night photography course with Sydney Photographic Workshops is a fun night’s photography for people looking to shoot and experiment with like minded people.  All you need is a Digital SLR, Hybrid or Micro camera with full manual controls, a sturdy tripod and lots of memory space.  

NOT SUITABLE FOR COMPACT CAMERAS WITHOUT FULL MANUAL CAPABILITY. 

A TRIPOD IS ESSENTIAL FOR THIS WORKSHOP - Please note - we do NOT loan tripods.


Basic overview of some of the topics that may be covered:

  • Shooting neon signs & fireworks
  • Photographing the moon
  • Night landscapes
  • Night portraits
  • Long exposure techniques
  • Using movement
  • Equipment
  • Safety, camera care & security
  • Working with available light
  • Introduction to manual exposure
  • Composition
  • Working with abstracts
  • Thinking outside the square
  • White balance techniques
  • Creative light painting techniques


THIS WORKSHOP IS HELD ON LOCATION AROUND THE SYDNEY HARBOUR FORESHORE - MEETING AT THE OPERA HOUSE

Suitable for both beginners and amateurs using a Digital SLR, Hybrid or Micro camera with manual capability.


You will need:

  • Your Camera(s)
  • A sturdy tripod (this is essential)
  • A selection of lenses if you have more than one 
  • A torch (to be used in exercises)
  • Lens Hood if you have one
  • Blank formatted memory Card(s) if shooting digital
  • Fully charged camera battery and spare if you have one
  • Your cameras manual(s) - for referencing those hard to find features 
  • Dress casual & comfortable with sensible shoes (you may get a little dirty at some locations)


Note: A tripod is ESSENTIAL for this workshop.


*A final weather check will be conducted with the Bureau of Meteorology on the day of each workshop.  This may lead to the workshop being postponed in cases of unfavourable weather reports.  The workshop may run in cases of light showers but not in persistent showers or heavy rain.  Should we need to postpone you will be notified via text message to the mobile number supplied to us.


Images by students and tutors, taken during the actual workshop.

product.name: Places, Landscapes & Travels (Photography Workshop Sydney)
product.shortDescription: Travel Photography is often considered the truest form of Photographic art. Long considered to be Remember Forever’s most popular workshop, “Places, Landscapes and Travels” helps you take the perfect photographs, no matter where you are!
product.description:
Travel Photography is often considered the truest form of Photographic art. Long considered to be Remember Forever’s most popular workshop, “Places, Landscapes and Travels” helps you take the perfect photographs, no matter where you are in the world.

This workshop is for the person who wants to take exceptional photographs of their vacations, holidays and getaways and capture those amazing landscapes you only see in magazines or on postcards. Learning the difference between a happy-snap and a photograph, you will learn to use the manual settings, quickly and reliably on your camera to ensure that you never miss capturing one of those special holiday moments or captivating sunsets, and we will make sure you have a photograph you will treasure forever.

This three-hour specialized workshop includes correct use of light and color, composition and framing of your image, identifying the key focus in your landscape, storytelling, balancing your image, finding the right angle and perspective and ensuring that the photograph you take tells the story of your travels to everyone who looks at it.

product.name: Sydney Photography Courses for Beginners - Day & Night
product.shortDescription: This workshop is a combination between an afternoon (3 hour) introductory session and an evening (3 hour) session. Tripod only needed for night session.
product.description: This is great value when you want to have an express learning session in one full day of action fun. Most importantly you can finish the day feeling much more confident on how to best use the manual setting on your camera. You can also walk away with a different perspective on how to best capture the different genres of travel photography. We will start with the botanical gardens as your backdrop with endless possibilities of close up and nature, followed by architecture and cityscape photos.

product.name: Scooter Tours
product.shortDescription: Snorkelling is a fun and exciting way to explore the oceans and our Supercharged Scooter Tours take snorkelling to the next level!
product.description:
We offer guided snorkelling tours with underwater scooters! Our underwater scooters are battery powered and designed to do all the work for you. Explore the wonders of the oceans brilliant colours and incredible marine life all at the push of a button on our Scooter Safari.

We've upgraded our scooter fleet and now have Sydney's fastest underwater scooters. Originally designed for military applications, these provide enough power to tow multiple snorkellers and are plenty fun for any adventure sports adrenalin seeking person.


HIGHLIGHTS

  • No experience is required!
  • Explore the ocean in safe and comfortable surroundings.
  • Supervision by our team of experienced and fun certified snorkel guides.
  • All snorkelling equipment is supplied.
  • Full face snorkel masks or traditional snorkels available!
  • Military-grade, supercharged underwater scooters and instruction on correct use provided.
  • Rinsing facilities and a HOT shower available after at our shop.

THE EXPERIENCE

With snorkels in your mouth, grasp the handles, push the button and suddenly you will be gliding effortlessly through the water. You will enjoy 90 minutes exploring the aquatic world via underwater scooter. The guided experience takes fishy folks on a tour of oceanic points of interests and interesting marine life while also imparting lessons on subjects such as clearing the mask and snorkel, surface swimming, surface dives and underwater manoeuvres.


PREREQUISITES

  • The minimum age to participate is 12 years old (a parent's or guardian's consent is required for participants under 18 years old.)
  • You must be able to swim.
  • All participants must complete a Medical Questionnaire.

product.name: Snorkel Tours & Snorkelling Courses
product.shortDescription: Snorkelling is a great way to begin your underwater adventures. It's your chance to start exploring a new and fascinating world and provides action, adventure and relaxation - whatever you are looking for.
product.description:
Snorkelling is an exciting activity that anyone young or old can enjoy with minimal equipment and little training. Explore the coastline and some of Sydney's top snorkelling spots under the supervision of one of our experienced and friendly guides. We cater for individuals or groups so grab some friends and family and join us for a Snorkelling Tour or a Snorkelling Course today! It's fun, easy and a great way to gain some basic skills and have loads of fun at the same time! 


HIGHLIGHTS

  • No experience is required!
  • Explore the ocean in safe and comfortable surroundings.
  • Supervision by our team of experienced and fun certified snorkel guides.
  • Instruction from one of our experienced snorkel instructors if you wish to complete your snorkelling course.
  • All snorkelling equipment is supplied.
  • Rinsing facilities and a HOT shower available after at our shop.

THE EXPERIENCE

The Snorkel Tour or Snorkelling Course takes approximately half a day. We meet all participants at our store so we can fit you out with proper snorkelling equipment and go over paperwork. Once at the snorkelling site you will receive a brief overview explaining whats going to happen during your tour, the equipment you will be using, some basic knowledge about snorkelling and the rules that need to be followed for your safety during the tour. 


PREREQUISITES

  • The minimum age to participate is 12 years old (a parent's or guardian's consent is required for participants under 18 years old.)
  • You must be able to swim.
  • All participants must complete a Medical Questionnaire.

product.name: Refresher Course
product.shortDescription: Has it be a while since your last dive or are you feeling a little rusty? Refresh your dive skills and renew your passion for the underwater world!
product.description:
Refreshers are a quick tune up designed to have you feeling safe, comfortable and having fun underwater again. You may have been asked to complete a refresher if it has been more than 12 months since your last dive. Some dive operators around the world make refresher dives compulsory so make sure you are current before you head off on that next dive adventure.


HIGHLIGHTS

  • All scuba diving equipment is supplied.
  • Free transport is provided to the dive site.
  • Refresher conducted in the ocean at one of our easy "confined water" dive sites, not in the pool.
  • Knowledgable and experienced instructors.
  • Rinsing facilities and a HOT shower available after at our shop.


THE EXPERIENCE

During the Refresher Course you will reacquaint yourself with your equipment, locating and clearing your regulator, clearing your mask, buoyancy control and your emergency “out of air” skills.

PREREQUISITES

  • Be certified as an SSI Open Water Diver / SSI Junior Open Water Diver, or hold an equivalent certification from another recognised certification agency.

product.name: Sydney Airport transfer (Sydney CBD to Airport) for up to 5 passengers
product.shortDescription: Premium Airport Transfer from anywhere in Sydney CBD and Cruise ship terminals to Sydney Airport for up to 5 passengers
product.description: Looking for a ride to Sydney Airport? Are you looking for professional, luxurious airport transfers for you or your family? This premium Sydney Airport departure transfer service is reliable and available to meet all domestic and international flights departing in Sydney any time of day or night and drive you from your pick-up location anywhere in Sydney CBD. Premium Airport Transfer to Sydney Airport from anywhere in Sydney CBD and Cruise ship terminals for up to 5 passengers and 5 luggage

product.name: Sydney Airport transfer (Airport to Sydney CBD) for up to 5 passengers
product.shortDescription: Premium Airport Transfer from Sydney Airport to anywhere in Sydney CBD and Cruise ship terminals for up to 5 passengers
product.description: Looking for a ride from Sydney Airport? Are you looking for professional, luxurious airport transfers for you or your family? This premium Sydney Airport arrival transfer service is reliable and available to meet all domestic and international flights arriving in Sydney any time of day or night and drive you to your destination anywhere in Sydney CBD. Premium Airport Transfer from Sydney Airport to anywhere in Sydney CBD and Cruise ship terminals for up to 5 passengers and 5 luggage
